curriculum_standard: Based on 2022/2017 National Curriculum Standards (Selective Compulsory)

topic_coverage.summary: Focus on critical thinking, global issues, technology, and literature.

categories.name: Category 1: Technology & Society (Man & Society)
sub_topics: Artificial Intelligence (AI in daily life, Robots)
Social Media (Pros and Cons, Connection vs Isolation)
example_prompts: Life in the Future: With or Without Robots?
My Views on Social Media Addiction

categories.name: Category 2: Arts & Literature (Man & Society)
sub_topics: Classic Literature (Review of a book, Favorite character)
The Power of Music (Traditional vs Modern)
example_prompts: A Review of a Classic Novel

categories.name: Category 3: Global Issues (Man & Nature)
example_prompts: Global Warming: What Can We Do?

categories.name: Category 4: Argumentative Skills
sub_topics: Balanced Viewpoints (On the one hand... On the other hand...)
Debate Topics (Should students bring phones to school?)

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 3000-3500 words. Abstract nouns and formal verbs.

complex_structures: Inversion (Only then did he... / Not only... but also...)
Subjunctive Mood (If I were you... / It is high time that...)
Noun Clauses (Appositive clauses: The fact that...)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Usage of inverted sentences for emphasis. Participle phrases for concise expression.

writing_standards.structure: Argumentative Structure: Thesis -> Arguments -> Counter-arguments -> Conclusion.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Critical thinking, depth of thought, precise vocabulary, complex grammar usage.
